1.verse: UThixo wayethethile nje kudala ngeendawo ezininzi,  nangeendlela ezininzi, koobawo ngabo abaprofeti, uthethe ngale mihla yokugqibela kuthi ngoNyana;

2.verse: awammisayo wayindlalifa yeento zonke, awathi kwangaye wayenza indalo yonke;

3.verse: othe, elubengezelo lobuqaqawuli bakhe, nombhalo wenkqu yakhe, ezithwele nokuzithwala zonke izinto ngalo ilizwi lamandla akhe, wesuka, akuba eyenzile ngokwakhe intlambululo yokusihlambulula ezonweni, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu, enyangweni;

4.verse: ethe waba ngonamandla ngaphezu kwezithunywa zezulu, ngangoko azuze ilifa legama eligqithiseleyo kunelazo.

5.verse: Kuba sisiphi na isithunywa, awakha wathi kuso, UnguNyana wam wena, Mna ndikuzele namhla? Nokuthi, Mna ndiya kuba nguYise wakhe, Yena abe nguNyana wam?

6.verse: Nangexa athi amngenise owamazibulo kwelimiweyo, uthi,  Maziqubude kuye zonke izithunywa zikaThixo.

7.verse: Okunene ngazo izithunywa zezulu uthi, Ulozenza izithunywa zakhe oomoya, Nababusi bakhe ilangatye lomlilo;

8.verse: kodwa ngaye yena uNyana uthi, Itrone yakho, Thixo, isa ephakadeni lasephakadeni; Yintonga ethe tye intonga yobukumkani bakho.

9.verse: Wathanda ubulungisa, wathiya okungendawo; Ngenxa yoko,  uThixo, uThixo wakho, ukuthambise Ngeoli yomgcobo ngaphezu kowenu.

10.verse: Abuye athi, Ekuqalekeni, wena Nkosi, waliseka ihlabathi,  Nalo izulu lingumsebenzi wezandla zakho;

11.verse: Wona aya kutshabalala, ke wena uhlala uhleli; Aye onke njengengubo eya konakala,

12.verse: Nanjengesambatho uya kuwasonga, Asuke abe ngawambi; Ke wena ukwanguwe, Nayo iminyaka yakho ayiyi kuphela.

13.verse: Sisiphi na ke isithunywa, awakha wathi kuso, Hlala ngasekunene kwam, Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze isihlalo seenyawo zakho?

14.verse: Azingomoya ababusayo zonke na, zithunywe ukuba zilungiselele abo baza kuba ziindlalifa zalo usindiso?

1.verse: Ngenxa yoko, simelwe kukuzinyamekela ngokugqithiseleyo izinto esazivayo, hleze sikhukuliswe simke kuzo.

2.verse: Kuba, ukuba ilizwi elathethwa ngezithunywa zezulu laqina,  kwathi konke ukugqitha nokungeva kwamkela umvuzo oyeleleyo;

3.verse: sothini na thina ukusinda, sakuba siluhilizele usindiso olungakanana, lona lwaqalwa ukuthethwa yiyo iNkosi, lwaza lwaqiniselwa kuthi ngabo baluvayo;

4.verse: uThixo engqinelana nabo ngemiqondiso kwanezimanga,  nemisebenzi ngemisebenzi yamandla, nezabelo zoMoya oyiNgcwele,  ngokokuthanda kwakhe?

5.verse: Kuba akalithobelanga phantsi kwezithunywa zezulu elimiweyo eliza kubakho, eli sithetha ngalo.

6.verse: Ke, wakha wangqina ubani, esithi, Uyintoni na umntu, le nto umkhumbulelayo? Unyana womntu, le nto umvelelayo?

7.verse: Wamnciphisa kancina ne kunezithunywa zezulu, Wamthwesa uzuko nembeko. Wammisa phezu kwemisebenzi yezandla zakho;

8.verse: Zonke izinto wazithobela phantsi kweenyawo zakhe. Kuba,  ekubeni wazithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto ezo,  akashiyanga nto ingathotyelwanga phantsi kwakhe. Kukaloku ke asikaziboni zithotyelwe phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto.

9.verse: Ke sibona lo uncitshiswe kancinane kunezithunywa zezulu,  uYesu ke, ethe ngenxa yeentlungu zokufa wathweswa uzuko nembeko, ukuze ngobabalo lukaThixo eve ukufa ngenxa yabo bonke.

10.verse: Kuba bekumfanele lowo, ezingenxa yakhe zonke izinto ezo,  nezingaye zonke izinto ezo, ekubeni ezise oonyana abaninzi eluzukweni, ukuthi ayenze ngeentlungu igqibelele imbangi yosindiso lwabo.

11.verse: Kuba lowo ungcwalisayo, kwanabo bangcwaliswayo, baphuma kumnye bonke; ekungenxa yeli thuba angenazintloni ukubabiza ngokuthi ngabazalwana,

12.verse: esithi, Ndiya kulixela igama lakho kubo abazalwana bam.  Ndivume phakathi kwebandla elokudumisa wena.

13.verse: Abuye athi, Ndiya kukholosa ngaye. Abuye athi, Yabona, mna nabantwana andinike bona uThixo.

14.verse: Ekubeni ngoko abantwana abo bengamadlelane naye ngenyama negazi, wathi naye ngokwakhe ngokukwanjalo wabelana nabo ngezo zinto, ukuze ngako ukufa ambhangise lowo unamandla okufa, oko kukuthi, uMtyholi lo;

15.verse: abakhulule ebukhobokeni bonke abo babethe ngalo lonke ixesha lokudla kwabo ubomi bazizisulu zokoyika ukufa.

16.verse: Kuba ndithi, akathabatheli kuye zithunywa; uthabathela kuye imbewu ka-Abraham.

17.verse: Ekuthe ngoko wafanelwa kukuba afane nabazalwana bakhe ngezinto zonke, ukuze abe ngonenceba, kwanombingeleli othembekileyo omkhulu ezintweni ezilunge kuThixo, ukuze azicamagushele izono zabantu.

18.verse: Kuba ekubeni eve ubunzima, ehendiwe naye ngokwakhe, unako ukubasiza abahendwayo.

1.verse: Ndithi ngoko, bazalwana bangcwele, mabelana ngobizo lwasemazulwini, mondeleni uMpostile, uMbingeleli oMkhulu wovumo lwethu, uKristu Yesu;

2.verse: ethembekile kulowo wamenzayo, kwanjengoMoses endlwini yakhe iphela.

3.verse: Kuba lo ubalelwe ekuthini ufanelwe luzuko olungaphezu kolukaMoses; ngangokuba lowo wayakhayo indlu, enembeko engaphezu kwayo indlu.

4.verse: Kuba yonke into eyindlu inoyakhayo; ke lowo wazakhayo zonke izinto nguThixo.

5.verse: Okunene noMoses ebethembekile endlwini yakhe iphela ngokomkhonzi, ukuze bube bubungqina obo bezinto eziya kuthethwa.

6.verse: Ke yena uKristu uthembeke ngokonyana phezu kwendlu yakhe;  esiyindlu yakhe ke thina, ukuba singaba sithe sakubamba ngokuthe nkqi ukungafihlisi kwethu, neqhayiya lethemba lethu,  sada sesa ekupheleni.

7.verse: Endithi ke, njengoko atshoyo uMoya oyiNgcwele, Namhla, ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe,

8.verse: Musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu,  Njengasengcaphukisweni, ngomhla wolingo entlango;

9.verse: Apho bandilingayo ooyihlo, bandicikida, Bayibona imisebenzi yam iminyaka emashumi mane.

10.verse: Kungoko ndakruqukayo seso sizukulwana, Ndathi, Bahlala belahleka ngeentliziyo, Abazazi ke bona iindlela zam;

11.verse: Njengoko ndafungayo, ndinengqumbo, Ndathi, Unakanye ukuba bokha bangene ekuphumleni kwam!

12.verse: Lumkani, bazalwana, hleze kubekho kubani wenu intliziyo engendawo, engakholwayo, enokumka kuThixo ophilileyo;

13.verse: manivuselelane imihla ngemihla, xa kusathiwa kunamhla,  ukuze kungabikho mntu kuni wenziwa lukhuni kukulukuhla kwesono.

14.verse: Kuba siba ngamabelana ngoKristu, ukuba sithe ingqalo yokukholosa kwethu sayibamba ngokuthe nkqi, sada sesa ekupheleni;

15.verse: ekubeni kusithiwa, Namhla, ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe,  Musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu,  njengasengcaphukisweni.

16.verse: Kuba bathe abathile, bevile, bacaphukisa, phofu ingengabo bonke abo baphumayo eYiputa ngoMoses.

17.verse: Yayingoobani na ke awakruquka ngabo iminyaka emashumi mane?  Yabingengabo na abo bonayo, bazidumbu zawayo entlango?

18.verse: Wafungela oobani na ke, ukuba abayi kungena ekuphumleni kwakhe, ingengabo abo bangevanga?

19.verse: Siyabona ke, ukuba babengenakungena, ngenxa yokungakholwa.

1.verse: Masoyike ngoko, hleze kuthi ekubeni kusasele idinga lokungena ekuphumleni kwakhe, kubekho bani kuni ungathi asilele.

2.verse: Kuba sizishunyayeziwe iindaba ezilungileyo kwanjengabo;  lathi kodwa ilizwi lodaba, lingadibananga nje nokholo kwabo balivayo, alabanceda nto.

3.verse: Kuba thina sakholwayo, siyangena ekuphumleni, ngokoko athe,  Njengoko ndafungayo, ndinengqumbo, Ndathi, Unakanye ukuba bokha bangene ekuphumleni kwam! nakubeni imisebenzi yenziwayo kususela ekusekweni kwehlabathi.

4.verse: Kuba wakha wathetha ngawo umhla wesixhenxe, ukuthi, Waza waphumla uThixo ngawo umhla wesixhenxe kuyo yonke imisebenzi yakhe;

5.verse: athi kule kananjalo, Unakanye ukuba bokha bangene ekuphumleni kwam.

6.verse: Ekubeni ngoko kusalindele ke ukuthi kubekho bathile bangenayo kuko, baye abo, bashunyayezwayo iindaba ezilungileyo kuqala, bengangenanga ngenxa yokungeva:

7.verse: ubuya amise mini ithile, esithi ngoDavide, Namhlanje, emveni kwexesha elingakanana; njengokuba kuthiwe, Namhla, ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe, Musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu.

8.verse: Kuba uYoshuwa, ukuba ubebaphumzile, ange engabuyanga athethe ngawo omnye umhla.

9.verse: Ngoko ke abantu bakaThixo balindwe luphumlo olunjengolwesabatha.

10.verse: Kuba lowo ungeneyo ekuphumleni kwakhe, naye ngokwakhe uphumle kuyo imisebenzi yakhe, njengoThixo kweyeyakhe.

11.verse: Masikhuthalele ngoko ukungena koko kuphumla, ukuze kungabikho namnye ubuya eyele kwakuloo mzekelo wokungeva.

12.verse: Kuba ilizwi likaThixo liphilile, lisebenza, libukhali ngaphezu kwamakrele onke antlangothi mbini; lihlaba liphumele,  lide lahlule umphefumlo kwanomoya, amalungu kwanomongo;  linokugweba iingcingane nezicamango zentliziyo.

13.verse: Kanjalo akukho sidalwa singabonakaliyo emehlweni akhe;  izinto zonke ke zize, zityhilekile, emehlweni alowo esinokuthana ni naye.

14.verse: Ngoko, sinombingeleli omkhulu nje ocande emazulwini, UYesu ke, uNyana kaThixo, masilubambe uvumo lwethu.

15.verse: Kuba asinambingeleli mkhulu ungenako ukuvelana nezilwelwe zethu; ke, sinowahendwayo ngeento zonke, ngokokufana nathi,  engenasono.

16.verse: Masisondlele ke ngoko sinokungafihlisi kuyo itrone yobabalo, ukuze samkeliswe inceba, sifumane ubabalo lokusiza ngexesha elililo.

1.verse: Kuba wonke umbingeleli omkhulu, engovele ebantwini nje,  umiselwa abantu ezintweni ezilunge kuThixo, ukuze asondeze iminikelo kwanamadini ngenxa yezono;

2.verse: enokuthantamisa kwabangazi nto nabalahlekayo, ekubeni naye ngokwakhe enxitywe ubulwelwe.

3.verse: Ngenxa yabo ke ufanelwe kukuthi, njengokuba esondezela abantu, kwangokunjalo azisondezele amadini ngenxa yezono.

4.verse: Kanjalo akukho mntu uzithabathela ngokwakhe imbeko leyo;  oyithabathayo ngobizwe nguThixo, kwanjengoAron.

5.verse: Ngokunjalo naye uKristu akazizukisanga ngokwakhe, ukuba abe ngumbingeleli omkhulu; wazukiswa ngowathethayo kuye, wathi,  UnguNyana wam wena, Mna ndikuzele namhla;

6.verse: njengokuba esithi nakwenye indawo, Wena ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade, Ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.

7.verse: Owathi ngemihla yenyama yakhe, xa wayesondeze izikhungo kwanezibongozo kulowo unako ukumsindisa ekufeni, kunye nodanduluko olunamandla, neenyembezi, waviwa ngenxa yokumhlonela kwakhe uThixo.

8.verse: Nakuba ebenguNyana, wafunda ukululama ngobunzima awabuvayo;

9.verse: waza, egqibelele, waba yimbangi yosindiso olungunaphakade kubo bonke abamlulamelayo,

10.verse: ebizwe nguThixo, ukuba abe ngumbingeleli omkhulu ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.

11.verse: Esineendawo ezininzi zokuthetha ngaye, ezilukhuni ukuchazwa, ekubeni nina naba buthuntu iindlebe.

12.verse: Kuba, nakuba benifanele ukuba ngabafundisi, ngenxa yokuba sekumzuzu nakholwayo, nibuye naswela umntu wokunifundisa iziqalelo zokuqala zezihlabo zikaThixo; nesuka naba ngabafanele ukusezwa amasi, anaba ngabafanele ukudla okuqinileyo.

13.verse: Kuba bonke abasasezwa amasi abanamava elizwi lobulungisa,  kuba beziintsana.

14.verse: Kokwabakhulileyo ke ukudla okuqinileyo, abo bathi, ngenxa yobugcisa, babe nezimvo eziqheliselwe ukucalula okuhle kwanokubi.

1.verse: Endithi ngoko, masithi, siyeka elengqalo ilizwi elithetha ngoKristu, siqhubele kwelokukhula; singabuyi siseke ngeloguquko emisebenzini efileyo, nokukholwa kuThixo,

2.verse: ngelemfundiso yeembhaptizo, neyokubekwa izandla, neyovuko lwabafileyo, neyogwebo olungunaphakade.

3.verse: Oko ke sokwenza, ukuba angaba uthe uThixo wavuma.

4.verse: Kuba abo bakha bakhanyiselwa, basiva isipho sasemazulwini,  baba ngamadlelana ngoMoya oyiNgcwele,

5.verse: bayiva incasa yelizwi elihle likaThixo, kwanamandla ephakade eliza kubakho,

6.verse: baza babuya bakreqa: akunakwenzeka ukuba babuye bahlaziyelwe enguqukweni; ekubeni bephinda ukuzibethelelela emnqamlezweni uNyana kaThixo, bamhlaze ekuhleni.

7.verse: Kuba umhlaba lo, uyiselayo imvula eza futhi phezu kwawo,  uvelise imifuno elungele bona abo ulinywa nokulinywa ngenxa yabo, wamkela intsikelelo kuThixo;

8.verse: ke, othi uvelise imithana enameva neenkunzane, awunto yanto,  ukufuphi nengqalekiso; esiphelo sisa ekutshisweni.

9.verse: Ke ngani nina, zintanda, sikholose ngelokuthi, nineendawo ezilungileyo kunezo, iindawo eziyelelene nosindiso, nakuba sisenjenje ukuthetha;

10.verse: kuba akanantswela-bulungisa uThixo, ukude awulibale umsebenzi wenu, nomzamo wothando enalubonakalalisa kulo igama lakhe, nabalungiselelayo nje abangcwele, nisamana nibalungiselela.

11.verse: Sinqwenela ke, ukuba ulowo kuni alubonakalalise kwaolo lukhuthalo, asingise kwinzaliseko yethemba, ade ase ekupheleni,  ukuze ningabi ngababuthuntu;

12.verse: ke nibe ngabaxelisa abo bathi, ngokholo nangokunyamezela,  bawadla ilifa amadinga.

13.verse: Kuba wathi uThixo, akumbeka ngedinga uAbraham, ekubeni bekungekho namnye umkhulu kunaye angamfungayo, wazifunga yena,

14.verse: esithi, Inene, ndiya kuthi, ndisikelela, ndikusikelele;  ndithi, ndisandisa, ndikwandise.

16.verse: Kuba abantu okunene bafunga lowo umkhulu kubo, sithi kubo isifungo siphelise yonke impikiswano, sise engqinisekweni.

17.verse: Uthe ngoko uThixo, enga angathi ngokukhona kugqithiseleyo akubonakalalise kwiindlalifa zedinga ukungaguquleki kwecebo lakhe, wasuka walamla ngesifungo;

18.verse: ukuze kuthi, ngezinto ezimbini ezingenakuguquleka, angenako ukuxoka ngazo uThixo, sithi thina, basindileyo, sabamba ithemba elibekwe phambi kwethu, sibe novuselelo olunamandla;

19.verse: ithemba ke esinalo ngokweankile yomphefumlo, linqabile,  likwaqinile, lingena liye ngaphaya kwesikhuselo;

20.verse: apho umanduleli uYesu wangena khona ngenxa yethu, ethe,  ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke, waba ngumbingeleli omkhulu osa ephakadeni.

1.verse: Kuba lo Melkitsedeke, kumkani weSalem, mbingeleli kaThixo Osenyangweni, wahlangabezanayo noAbraham, ebuya evela ekubulaleni ookumkani, wamsikelela;

2.verse: awathi uAbraham wamabela nesishumi sezinto zonke (esithi okunene, ukuqala ukuthetha ngentetho evakalayo, ngukumkani wobulungisa, kodwa kamva abe nangukumkani weSalem, oko kukuthi,  ngukumkani woxolo;

3.verse: engenayise, engenanina, engenamlibo wakuzalwa, engenasiqalo samihla, engenasiphelo sabomi, enziwe wafana naye uNyana kaThixo): lo uhleli engumbingeleli ngokungapheliyo.

4.verse: Bonani ke ukuba mkhulu kwalowo, wathi uAbraham umawokhulu wamnika nesishumi emaxhobeni, awona alinqatha.

5.verse: Abo okunene bakoonyana bakaLevi, babamkelayo ububingeleli,  banomthetho wokubanga isishumi kubo abantu ngokomthetho; oko kukuthi, kubo abazalwana babo, nakuba bephume esinqeni sika-Abraham.

6.verse: Kodwa yena, ongenamlibo wakuzalwa uphumayo kubo, ubange isishumi kuAbraham, wasikelela lowo unamadinga.

7.verse: Ke ngokungenakuphikwa, encinane into isikelelwa yeyona inkulu.

8.verse: Kananjalo apha okunene ngabantu abanokufa, abathabatha isishumi; kodwa khona apho ngongqinelweyo ukuba udla ubomi.

9.verse: Ukutsho ke ndithi, kubangwe ngoAbraham isishumi nakuLevi, lo wamkelayo izishumi;

10.verse: kuba ubesesinqeni sikayise, oko uMelkitsedeke wamhlangabezayo.

11.verse: Ke ngoko, ukuba okunene inzaliseko ibingabakho ngobubingeleli bakwaLevi (kuba abantu bewiselwe owobubingeleli umthetho), bekusafuneka ngantoni na ke, ukuba kubuye kuvele mbingeleli wumbi ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke, angabizwa ngokohlobo luka-Aron?

12.verse: Kuba, ububingeleli baguqulwa nje, kufuneka ukuba kuguqulwe nomthetho.

13.verse: Kuba lowo, zithethwa ngaye ezi zinto, waye engowasizwe simbi, ebekungekho namnye kuso ubesinyamekele isibingelelo.

14.verse: Kuba kusekuhleni kanye, ukuba iNkosi yethu iphume kwesikaYuda isizwe, eso angathethanga nto ngaso uMoses ngobubingeleli.

15.verse: Kwaza kwasekuhleni ngakumbi, ukuba kuvela mbingeleli wumbi,  ngokokufana noMelkitsedeke,

16.verse: ongathanga amiswe ngokomyalelo womthetho ongowenyama;  wamiswa ngokwamandla obomi obungenakupheliswa.

17.verse: Kuba ungqina ngokuthi, Wena ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade,  Ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.

18.verse: Kuba okunene kutshitshiswa umthetho owandulelayo, ngenxa yokuswela amandla, nokungancedi lutho kwawo

19.verse: (kuba umthetho lowo awuzalisanga nto); ke kungeniswe phezu kwawo elona themba lilungileyo; esisondela ngalo kuye uThixo.

20.verse: Kanjalo, ngangokuba engamiswanga, kungabangakho sifungo (kuba bona aba okunene benziwe ababingeleli kungafungwanga;

21.verse: kodwa yena umiswe ngokufunga kwalowo wathi kuye, Yafunga iNkosi, ayiyi kuzohlwaya: Wena ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade,  ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke):

22.verse: ngangoko ke uYesu waba ngummeli wowona ulungileyo umnqophiso.

23.verse: Bathe bona ababingeleli baba baninzi, ngenxa yokuba ukufa kwakungavumi ukuba bahlale behleli;

24.verse: ke yena, ngenxa yokuba ehleli ngonaphakade,  unobubingeleleli obungenakudlula.

25.verse: Ngoko unako nokubasindisa kanye abo bezayo ngaye kuThixo,  ehlala ehleli nje ukuba abathethelele.

26.verse: Kuba ubesifanele umbingeleli omkhulu onjalo, ongcwele,  ongenabubi, ongenabala, owahlukileyo kubo aboni, othe waba ngaphezu kwalo izulu;

27.verse: ekungafunekiyo ukuba athi imihla ngemihla,  njengababingeleli abakhulu abaya, anyuse kuqala amadini ngenxa yezono ezizezakhe, andule ukunyusa ngenxa yezabantu; kuba oko wakwenza kwaba kanye, ekuzinyuseni ngokwakhe ngokwedini.

28.verse: Kuba umthetho umisa abantu benobulwelwe, babe ngababingeleli abakhulu; ke lona ilizwi lesifungo, esingasemva komthetho, limise uNyana, egqibelele ngonaphakade.

1.verse: Ke kaloku, eyona nto iyintloko kwezi zinto zithethwayo yile:  Sinombingeleli omkhulu onje, othe wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kwetrone yobuKhulu emazulwini,

2.verse: ongumbusi wengcwele, nowomnquba wenyaniso owamiswayo yiNkosi, awamiswa ngumntu.

3.verse: Kuba wonke umbingeleli omkhulu umiselwa ukuba asondeze iminikelo kwanamadini; ekuthe ngenxa yoko kwafuneka ukuba naye lo abe nento ayisondezayo.

4.verse: Kuba okunene, ukuba ebesemhlabeni, ubengayi kukha abe mbingeleli, bekho nje ababingeleli abayisondezayo iminikelo ngokomthetho:

5.verse: bona bathi bakhonze umzekelo nesithunzi sezinto zasemazulwini, kwanjengokuba uMoses wayehlatyelwe nguThixo, xa abeza kuwufeza umnquba; kuba wathi, Khangela ukuba uzenze zonke izinto ngokomfuziselo owawuboniswayo entabeni.

6.verse: Kodwa kungoku, uzuze umbuso ogqithiseleyo kulowo,  kangangokuba engumlamleli womnqophiso olungileyo ngakumbi, wona usekwe phezu kwawona madinga alungileyo.

7.verse: Kuba, ukuba ubungenakusoleka lowo wokuqala, ubungayi kufunelwa ndawo owesibini.

8.verse: Kuba uthi kubo, esola, Yabona, kuza imihla, itsho iNkosi,  Endiya kuzalisekisa phezu kwendlu kaSirayeli, naphezu kwendlu kaYuda, umnqophiso omtsha;

9.verse: Ungahambi ngokomnqophiso endawenzela ooyise, Mini ndababamba ngesandla, ukuba ndibakhuphe emhlabeni waseYiputa; Ngokuba bengahlalanga emnqophisweni wam bona, Ndaza nam andabakhathalela; itsho iNkosi;

10.verse: Ngokuba nangu wona umnqophiso, endiya kuwenzela indlu kaSirayeli Emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuthi,  ndiyibeke imithetho yam engqondweni yabo, Ndiyibhale ezintliziyweni zabo, Ndibe nguThixo kubo, Nabo babe ngabantu kum.

11.verse: Kanjalo abayi kukha bafundise elowo ummelwane wakhe, Elowo umzalwana wakhe, esithi, Yazi iNkosi; Ngokuba baya kundazi bonke, Bethabathela komncinane wabo, base komkhulu wabo.

12.verse: Ngokuba ndiya kukuxolela ukungalungisi kwabo, Nezono zabo,  nokuchasa kwabo umthetho, ndingabi sakukhumbula.

13.verse: Ngokuthi oku, Omtsha, uwaluphalisile owokuqala. Ke loo nto yalupheleyo, yalixhego, iseyisondele ekuthini shwaka.

1.verse: Ke ngoko nowokuqala umnqophiso wawunezimiselo zombuso,  kwanendawo engcwele yehlabathi.

2.verse: Kuba kwakhiwa umnquba lowo. Igumbi lokuqala lalinesiphatho sezibane, kwanetafile, nesiboniso sezonka; lona kuthiwa yingcwele.

3.verse: Emva ke kwesesibini isikhuselo, kwabakho umnquba lo kuthiwa yingcwele kangcwele;

4.verse: unesibingelelo segolide sokuqhumisa; nayo ityeya yomnqophiso, yalekwe ngegolide ngeenxa zonke, inesitya segolide ngaphakathi esinemana, inentonga ka-Aron eyadubulayo, inawo amacwecwe omnqophiso.

5.verse: Ke ngaphezu kwayo kwema iikerubhi zobuqaqawuli, zisibekele isicamagushelo; izinto ezo esingenakuthetha ngazo ngazinye ngoku.

6.verse: Ke kaloku, zakubon ukuba zenziwe ngokunjalo ezo zinto,  ababingeleli bangena okunene amaxa onke kowokuqala umnquba,  beyifeza imibuso kaThixo.

7.verse: Kodwa kowesibini kungena kube kanye ngomnyaka umbingeleli omkhulu yedwa, engangeni engenagazi, alisondezayo ngenxa yakhe,  nangenxa yokungazi kwabantu.

8.verse: Abe ngoku uMoya oyiNgcwele esazisa ukuthi, indlela eya kweyona ngcwele ayikabonakalaliswa, umnquba wokuqala usemi;

9.verse: wona lo ungumzekeliso ozise exesheni elingeneyo, ekuthi ngalo kusondezwe iminikelo kwanamadini, izinto ezo ezingenako ngokwesazela ukumenza agqibelele lowo ukhonzayo;

10.verse: ezithe, ndawonye nezinto ezidliwayo neziselwayo,  neentlambululo ngeentlambululo, ezizizimiselo zenyama kuphela,  zamiselwa ukuba kude kufike ixesha lolungiso.

11.verse: Ke yena uKristu, efike wangumbingeleli omkhulu wazo izinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, uthe ngowona mkhulu ugqibeleleyo umnquba, ongenakwenziwa ngazandla, oko kukuthi, ongengowale ndalo,

12.verse: wangena kwaba kanye kweyona ngcwele, kungengalo negazi leebhokhwe nelamathole, kungegazi elilelakhe; wafumana inkululo engunaphakade ngokusihlawulela.

13.verse: Kuba, ukuba igazi leenkomo neleebhokhwe, nothuthu lwethokazi olufefa abaziinqambi, lungcwalisela ekuhlambululeni inyama:

14.verse: lobeka phi na ukugqithisela lona igazi likaKristu,  owazisondeza ngoMoya ongunaphakade, engenasiphako, kuye uThixo,  ukusihlambulula isazela senu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo?

15.verse: Nangenxa ke yoko, ungumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ukuze bathi abo babiziweyo (kwakubon,ukuba kubekho ukufa okuhlawulela izigqitho, ezibe ziphantsi kwawo umnqophiso wokuqala), balamkele idinga lelifa elingunaphakade.

16.verse: Kuba apho kukhoyo umnqophiso womyoleli, kufuneka ukuba kucace ukufa kwalowo unqophisileyo.

17.verse: Kuba umnqophiso uqiniseka bakuba befile, ekubeni ungaze ube namandla xenikweni asadla ubomi lowo unqophisileyo.

18.verse: Ekuthe ngoko nowokuqala awasungulwa kungekho gazi.

19.verse: Kuba kuthe, kwakubon ukuba umthetho wonke uxeliwe nguMoses ebantwini bonke ngokomyalelo, walithabatha igazi lamathole neleebhokhwe, ndawonye namanzi, noboya obubomvu, nehisope,  wafefa incwadi ngokwayo, kwanabantu bonke;

20.verse: esithi, Eli ligazi lawo umnqophiso, aniwisele umthetho ngawo uThixo.

21.verse: Nomnquba ke, nazo zonke iimpahla zombuso, wazifefa ngokunjalo ngegazi.

22.verse: Kananjalo ngokomthetho ndingade ndithi, zonke izinto ziphantse ukuba zihlanjululwe ngegazi; kungaphalalanga gazi,  akubikho kuxolelwa.

23.verse: Kwafuneka ngoko, ukuba okunene izizekelo zezinto ezisemazulwini zihlanjululwe ngezinto ezinjalo, kodwa zona iziqu zazo ezasemazulwini zihlanjululwe ngamadini alungileyo kunalawo.

24.verse: Kuba uKristu akangenanga kweyona ngcwele inokwenziwa ngezandla, engumfuziselo weyenyaniso; ungene kuwo amazulu ngokwawo, ukuba abonakale ngoku ebusweni bukaThixo ngenxa yethu.

25.verse: Kananjalo akangenanga ukuze azisondeze futhi, njengokuba umbingeleli omkhulu ebengena kweyona ngcwele iminyaka ngeminyaka, enegazi lenye into;

26.verse: okanye ange emelwe kukuba abe ebeve ubunzima futhi,  kuseloko lasekwayo ihlabathi. Ke uthe ngoku, ekufinyezweni kwawo amaphakade, wabonakalaliswa kwaba kanye, ukuba atshitshise isono ngelilelakhe idini.

27.verse: Ke kwanjengokuba ke abantu bemiselwe ukuba bafe kube kanye,  ize ke emveni koko ibe ngumgwebo:

28.verse: ngokunjalo uKristu, esondezwe kwaba kanye, ukuba asithwale asisuse isono sabaninzi, uya kuthi okwesibini, ngaphandle kwesono, abonakale kwabo bamlindileyo, ezisa usindiso.

1.verse: Kuba umthetho, unesithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenaso sona isimilo sazo izinto, awuze ube nako, iminyaka ngeminyaka, ngaloo madini bawasondeza ngokungapheliyo, ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo.

2.verse: Okanye ange engayekwanga na ukusondezwa, ngenxa yokuba abo bakhonzayo, behlanjululwe nje kwaba kanye, bengasenasazela sazono?

3.verse: Kusuke kuwo apho kubekho ukukhunjuzwa kwezono iminyaka ngeminyaka.

4.verse: Kuba akunakwenzeka ukuthi igazi leenkomo neleebhokhwe lisuse izono.

5.verse: Kungoko, akungena ehlabathini, athi, Akuthandanga mbingelelo, namnikelo wakudla, Ke undilungisele umzimba;

6.verse: Amadini atshiswayo kuphele, nangawesono, akukholiswanga ngawo.

7.verse: Ndaza ndathi, Yabona, ndiyeza (Encwadini esongwayo kubhalwe ngam), Ndiza kwenza ukuthanda kwakho, Thixo.

8.verse: Esithi nje ngentla, Imibingelelo, neminikelo yokudla,  namadini atshiswayo kuphele, nangawesono, akuwathandanga,  akukholiswanga ngawo (wona lawo asondezwayo ngokomthetho),

9.verse: ubuye athi, Yabona, ndiza kwenza ukuthanda kwakho, Thixo.  Ususa okokuqala, ukuze amise okwesibini.

10.verse: Esithe, ngokokuthanda kwakhe, sangcwaliswa ngokusondezwa komzimba kaYesu Kristu, kwaba kanye.

11.verse: Wonke ke ongumbingeleli uma okunene imihla ngemihla ebusa,  ewasondeza futhi kwawona loo madini, angenako nakanye ukususa isono.

12.verse: Kodwa yena lo, esondeze idini lalinye ngenxa yezono, usuke wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kukaThixo ngokungapheliyo;

13.verse: okokugqibela elinde ukuba zide iintshaba zakhe zenziwe isihlalo seenyawo zakhe.

14.verse: Kuba ngamnikelo mnye ubenze bagqibelela ngokungapheliyo abo bangcwaliswayo.

15.verse: Uyasingqinela ke naye uMoya oyiNgcwele; kuba, emveni kokuba etshilo ngenxa engaphambili ukuthi,

16.verse: Nangu wona umnqophiso, endiya kuwenza nabo Emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi, Ndiya kuyibeka imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, Ndiya kuyibhala ezingqondweni zabo, ubuya athi,

17.verse: Izono zabo nokuchasa umthetho kwabo ndingabi sakukhumbula.

18.verse: Ke apho uxolelo lwezo zinto lukhona, akusekho mnikelo ngenxa yesono.

19.verse: Ngoko, bazalwana, sinokungafihlisi nje ukungena kweyona ngcwele ngalo igazi likaYesu,

20.verse: ngendlela entsha, ephilileyo, awayisungulela thina,  iphumela esikhuselweni, oku kukuthi, enyameni yakhe;

21.verse: sinombingeleli omkhulu nje phezu kwendlu kaThixo:

22.verse: masisondele sinentliziyo eyinyaniso, sinenzaliseko yokholo, sifefiwe iintliziyo zethu, sisusiwe isazela esingendawo. Masithi, sihlanjiwe nje umzimba ngamanzi amhlophe,

23.verse: silubambe uvumo lwethu lwethemba, lungabi nakuxengaxenga;  kuba uthembekile lowo wabeka ngedinga.

24.verse: Kanjalo masinyamekelane, ukuba silolane eluthandweni nasemisebenzini emihle;

25.verse: singakuhilizeli ukuhlanganisana kwethu, njengesiko labanye. Masivuselelane kube kokukhona, niyibona nje ukuba imini leyo iyasondela.

26.verse: Kuba, xa sithi sone ngabomi, emveni kokuba sakwamkelayo ukwazi inyaniso, akusasele dini ngenxa yezono;

27.verse: sekusele ke ukulinda okoyikekayo kakhulu, umgwebo nomsindo womlilo, oza kudla abo bachasileyo.

28.verse: Umntu obegiba okaMoses umthetho, ubebulawa kungekho tarhu,  ngezwi lamangqina amabini, nokuba mathathu.

29.verse: Niba wobeka phi na ke ukufanelwa kukubethwa okubi ngakumbi, lo umnyathelele phantsi uNyana kaThixo, walibalela ekuthini liyinqambi igazi lomnqophiso athe wangcwaliswa ngalo,  wamgxeka uMoya wobabalo?

30.verse: Kuba siyamazi lowo watshoyo ukuthi, Impindezelo yeyam,  kuya kubuyekeza mna, itsho iNkosi. Kananjalo wathi, INkosi iya kubagweba abantu bayo.

31.verse: Kuyoyikeka ke ukweyela ezandleni zoThixo ophilileyo.

32.verse: Zikhumbuzeni ke imihla yangaphambili, enakhanyiselwa ngayo, nanyamezela umzamo omkhulu weentlungu;

33.verse: enaphatha ukuthi nenziwe isibonelo ngeengcikivo kwaneembandezelo, naphatha ukuthi nibe ngamadlelana nabo bahamba ngokunjalo.

34.verse: Kuba navelana nam ndisezintanjeni; kananjalo nakwamkela ngovuyo ukuphangwa kweempahla zenu, nisazi ukuba ninayo kuni ngokwenu emazulwini eyona mpahla ilungileyo, ihlala ihleli.

35.verse: Musani ukukulahla ngoko ukungafihlisi kwenu, kona kunokwamkela umvuzo omkhulu.

36.verse: Kuba kufuneka ukuba nibe nomonde, ukuze nithi, nakuba nikwenzile ukuthanda kukaThixo, nizuzane nalo idinga.

37.verse: Kuba kusaya kuba mzuzwana mncinanana, Athi lowo uzayo afike, angalibali.

38.verse: Ke lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni;  Ukuba ke uthe wahlehla, awuyi kukholiswa nguye umphefumlo wam.

39.verse: Ke thina asingabahlehla baye entshabalalweni; singabokholo olusa ekuzuzeni umphefumlo.

1.verse: Ukholo ke kukukholosa ngezinto ezithenjiweyo; kukweyiseka bubukho bezinto ezingabonwayo.

2.verse: Kuba amanyange angqinelwa ngokuba nalo olo.

3.verse: Ngokholo siyaqonda ukuba indalo le yonke yenziwe yabakho ngelizwi likaThixo, ukuze izinto ezi zibonwayo zibe aziphume kwezibonakalayo.

4.verse: Ngokholo uAbheli wasondeza kuye uThixo umbingelelo ogqithileyo kunokaKayin, awangqinelwa ngawo ukuba ulilungisa,  uThixo wayingqinelayo nje iminikelo yakhe; ngalo ke, efile nje,  usathetha.

5.verse: Ngokholo uEnoki wafuduselwa emazulwini ukuba angaboni kufa;  akaba nakufunyanwa ke, ngenxa enokuba uThixo wamfudusayo; kuba ngaphambi kokufuduswa kwakhe, wangqinelwa ukuba umkholise kakuhle uThixo.

6.verse: Ke, lungekho ukholo, akunakubakho ukumkholisa kakuhle; kuba lowo uzayo kuThixo, umelwe kukukholwa ukuba ukho, nokuba ungumvuzi wabo bamfunayo.

7.verse: Ngokholo uNowa, ehlatyelwe nguThixo ngazo izinto ebezingekabonwa, wathi ngokoyika uThixo wawakha umkhombe wokusindisa indlu yakhe, awathi ngalo waligweba ihlabathi, waba yindlalifa yobulungisa obungokokholo.

8.verse: Ngokholo uAbraham wathi, akubizwa, Wakululamela ukuba aphume, aye kuloo ndawo abeza kuyamkela ukuba ibe lilifa;  waphuma ke, engazi kakuhle nalapho aya khona.

9.verse: Ngokholo waba ngumphambukeli emhlabeni wedinga, wanga ukowasemzini, ehleli eminqubeni, ndawonye noIsake noYakobi,  beziindlalifa zalo elo dinga ndawonye naye;

10.verse: kuba wayewulindele umzi lo uneziseko, ungcibi, umbangi wawo, inguThixo.

11.verse: Ngokholo noSara ngokwakhe wamkela amandla okumisa umzi,  waza wazala, liseligqithile ixesha lokuba amithe, ekubeni wambalela ekuthini uthembekile lowo wabekayo ngedinga.

12.verse: Kungoko kwazalwayo ngamnye, engofileyo ke lowo, into engangeenkwenkwezi zezulu ukuba yintabalala, nanjengentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle, engenakubalwa.

13.verse: Aba bonke bafa ngokokholo, bengawafumananga amadinga;  besuka bawabona kude, bakholosa, bathakazela, bavuma ukuba bangabasemzini, balundwendwe emhla beni.

14.verse: Kuba abo bathetha izinto ezinjalo, babonakalalisa ukuba bangxamele ikowabo.

15.verse: Ke, ukuba okunene babekhumbula elo babephuma kulo, ngebaba nethuba lokubuyela kulo.

16.verse: Kodwa ngoku bazolulela kwelona lilungileyo, oko kukuthi,  kwelasemazulwini. Kungoko uThixo angenazintloni ngabo, ukuba kuthiwe unguThixo wabo, kuba ebalungisele umzi.

17.verse: Ngokholo uAbraham wamnikela uIsake, akulingwa; waye,  owawamkelayo ngovuyo amadinga lawo, enikela okuphela kwawamzalayo;

18.verse: ekwakuthethwe kuye kwathiwa, Iya kubizwa ngoIsake imbewu yakho;

19.verse: ecamanga ngokuthi, uThixo unako ukuvusa nakwabafileyo;  apho athe ngoko Wamzuza ngokomzekeliso.

20.verse: Ngokholo uIsake wabasikelela uYakobi noEsawu, ngazo izinto eziza kubakho.

21.verse: Ngokholo uYakobi uthe, xa aqhawukayo, wabasikelela oonyana bakaYosefu ngabanye, waqubuda esimelele ngentonga yakhe.

22.verse: Ngokholo uYosefu uthe, xa abhubhayo, wakukhankanya ukuphuma koonyana bakaSirayeli, wawisa umthetho ngawo amathambo akhe.

23.verse: Ngokholo uMoses uthe, akuba ezelwe, wafihlwa iinyanga zantathu ngabazali bakhe, ngenxa enokuba bambona ukuba ungumntwana omhle, abasoyika isimiselo sokumkani.

24.verse: Ngokholo uMoses uthe, akuba mkhulu, akavuma ukubizwa ngokuthi ungunyana wentombi kaFaro;

25.verse: enyula kanye ukuba aphathwe kakubi, ndawonye nabantu bakaThixo, kunokuba axhamle izono okomzuzwana;

26.verse: ekubalele ukungcikivwa kukaKristu kububutyebi obungaphezu kobutyebi baseYiputa, kuba wayekhangele ukwamkela umvuzo.

27.verse: Ngokholo wayishiya iYiputa, akawoyika umsindo wokumkani;  kuba wakrota, wanga uyambona lowo ungenakubonwa.

28.verse: Ngokholo uyenzile ipasika nokutshizwa kwegazi, ukuze lowo wayewatshabalalisa amazibulo angawachukumisi.

29.verse: Ngokholo baluwela uLwandle oluBomvu, kwanga kusemhlabeni owomileyo; athe amaYiputa, akukulinga oko, antywiliselwa.

30.verse: Ngokholo zawa iindonga zaseYeriko, zakuba zijikeleziwe iimini ezisixhenxe.

31.verse: Ngokholo uRahabhi ihenyukazi akatshabalalanga nabo bangevayo, akuba ezamkele iintlola ngoxolo.

32.verse: Ndisathetha ntoni na? Kuba ndingaphelelwa lixesha ndibalisa ngoGidiyon, kwanoBharaki, noSamson, noYifeta,  kwanoDavide, noSamuweli, nangabo abaprofeti;

33.verse: abathe ngokholo beyisa izikumkani, basebenza ubulungisa,  bazuzana namadinga, bavingca imilomo yeengonyama,

34.verse: bacima amandla omlilo, basinda kwiintlangothi zekrele,  bomelela ekubeni bebeswele amandla, baba ngamagorha emfazweni,  bagxotha imikhosi yabasemzini.

35.verse: Abafazi babazuza abafileyo babo bevukile; abanye ke batyakatywa, bengalwamkelanga ukhululo, ukuze bazuzane nolona luvuko lululo.

36.verse: Bambi ke benziwa intlekisa, batyakatywa; phezu koko ke baviswa imixokelelwane nentolongo;

37.verse: baxulutywa ngamatye; basarhwa; bahendwa; bafa kukubulawa ngekrele; bahamba ngeengubo zeegusha nangeengaga zeebhokhwe,  beswele, bebandezelwe, bephathwa kakubi

38.verse: (elalingabafanele ihlabathi), bedinga koozintlango,  noozintaba, noomiqolomba, nakwimingxuma yomhlaba.

39.verse: Aba ke bonke bathi, nakuba babengqinelwe ngalo ukholo,  abazuzana nalo idinga,

40.verse: uThixo esazalelele thina ngeyona nto ilungileyo, ukuze bangenziwa bagqibelele ngaphandle kwethu.

1.verse: Ngako oko ke, sinelifu elingakanana nje elisingqongileyo lamangqina, masithi nathi, siwubekile nxamnye wonke umthwalo,  naso isono esinokusirhawula ngokusisulu, silubaleke ngomonde ugqatso olubekwe phambi kwethu;

2.verse: sise amehlo kuyo iMbangi noMgqibelelisi wokholo lwethu,  uYesu, owathi, ngenxa yovuyo olwalubekwe phambi kwakhe,  wawunyamezela umnqamlezo, elidelile ihlazo, waza wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kwetrone kaThixo.

3.verse: Ewe, mqondeni lowo ukunyamezeleyo ukumphikisa okungaka kwaboni, ukuze ningadinwa, ingatyhafi imiphefumlo yenu.

4.verse: Anikachasi kude kube segazini, nizamana naso isono.

5.verse: Kananjalo senilulibele uvuselelo olu, luthetha kuni ngathi kukoonyana, lusithi, Nyana wam, musa ukukucekisa ukuqeqesha kweNkosi, Kananjalo ungatyhafi wakohlwaywa yiyo;

6.verse: Kuba lowo imthandayo iNkosi iyamqeqesha, Ibatyakatye ke bonke oonyana ebamkelayo.

7.verse: Ukuba ninyamezela uqeqesho, uThixo woba uniphethe njengoonyana; kuba nguwuphi na unyana ongaqeqeshwayo nguyise?

8.verse: Ukuba ke aniqeqeshwa, abathe baba ngamadlelane ngalo bonke,  noba nina niyimigqakhwe ngoko, aningoonyana.

9.verse: Kananjalo sibe sinabo oobawo benyama okunene besiqeqesha,  sabahlonela; asiyi kuthi ngakumbi na sithobele uYise woomoya bonke, sidle ubomi?

10.verse: Kuba bona okunene basiqeqesha imihla embalwa,  ngokokuzithandela kwabo, kodwa yena usiqeqeshela okusilungeleyo, ukuze sahlulelane ngobungcwele bakhe.

11.verse: Lonke ke uqeqesho okunene ngokwakalokunje alubonakali luluvuyo, lubonakala luyintlungu; kodwa kamva lubanika isiqhamo esiluxolo, oko kukuthi sobulungisa, abo baqhelisiweyo lulo.

12.verse: Kungoko endithi, Zimiseni izandla eziwileyo, namadolo anedumbe;

13.verse: iinyawo zenu nizenzele imizila ethe tye, ukuze into eqhwalelayo ingaphambuki endleleni, kanye ke iphiliswe.

14.verse: Phuthumani uxolo nabo bonke, nobungcwele, ekungekho namnye uya kuyibona iNkosi, engenabo;

15.verse: nivelela, ukuze kungabikho bani usilelayo elubabalweni lukaThixo, kungabikho ngcambu yabukrakra, ithi ivele ihlume,  inikhathaze, bathi abaninzi badyojwe yiyo;

16.verse: kungabikho bani ulihenyu, nokuba ngumhlambeli,  njengoEsawu, owathi ngenxa yentwana yokudla wananisa ngobuzibulo bakhe.

17.verse: Kuba niyazi ukuba wathi kamva, ethanda ukuyidla ilifa intsikelelo, walahlwa; kuba akafumananga thuba languquko, noko wayingxamelayo ngeenyembezi.

18.verse: Kuba anisondelanga ntabeni iphathwayo, itshayo ngumlilo,  nasithokothokweni, na bumnyameni, naluqhwitheleni,

19.verse: nasandini saxilongo, nasithongeni samazwi, abathe abo basivayo bacela kabukhali, ukuba kungabi sathethwa lizwi kubo.

20.verse: Kuba babengenakukuthwala oko babeyalwa ngako; nokuba ithe inkomo yayichukumisa intaba, ibiya kuxulutywa ngamatye, ithi mhlawumbi ibinzwe ngomkhonto;

21.verse: yaza loo nto yabonakalayo yoyikeka, kangangokuba uMoses athi, Ndiyoyika kakhulu, ndiyagubha.

22.verse: Nisuke nina nafika eZiyon, entabeni nasemzini woThixo ophilileyo, kwiYerusalem yasemazulwini, nakumawakawaka ezithunywa zezulu,

23.verse: kwingqungquthela, nakwibandla lamazibulo abhaliweyo emazulwini, nakuThixo, uMgwebi wabo bonke, nakoomoya bamalungisa agqibeleleyo,

24.verse: nakuMlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, uYesu, nakwigazi lokufefa, elithetha ezona zinto zilungileyo kunelika-Abheli.

25.verse: Lumkani, ningamali lowo uthethayo. Ukuba ke abo, bamalayo lowo wahlabayo izihlabo emhlabeni, abasindanga, kobeka phi na ke ukugqithisela kokungasindi kwethu, thina bamnikela umva lowo uhlaba esemazulwini;

26.verse: olizwi oko lawuzamazamisayo umhlaba; ngoku ke ubeke ngedinga, esithi, Kusaya kuba ngumzuzwana endiya kuthi mna ndinganyikimisi mhlaba wodwa, ndinyikimise nalo izulu.

27.verse: Oku kuthi ke, Kusaya kuba ngumzuzwana, kubonakalalisa ukuguqulwa kwezinto ezizanyazanyiswayo, ngathi kokwezenziweyo,  ukuze zihlale zona ezingenakuzanyazanyiswa.

28.verse: Masithi ngoko, sisamkela ubukumkani obungenakuzanyazanyiswa nje, sibe nombulelo, simkhonze ngawo uThixo ngokukholekileyo, sinokuhlonela nokoyika;

2.verse: Musani ukukulibala ukubuka iindwendwe; kuba ngokwenjenjalo inxenye ibuke izithunywa zezulu, ingazi.

3.verse: Bakhumbuleleni abakhonkxiweyo, ninge nikhonkxiwe nani; nabo ke baphathwa kakubi, njengokuba nisemzimbeni nani.

4.verse: Umtshato mawubekeke ngeendlela zonke, nesilili masingadyojwa; ke abenza umbulo nabakrexezi, uThixo uya kubagweba.

5.verse: Isimilo senu masibe sesingathandi mali, yanelani zizinto eninazo; kuba etshilo yena ukuthi, Andiyi kukha ndikuyekele;  wabuya wathi, Andiyi kukha ndikushiye;

6.verse: ngokokude somelele sithi, INkosi ilusizo lwam, andiyi koyika; Wondenza ntoni na umntu?

7.verse: Bakhumbuleleni abakhokeli benu, abalithethayo kuni ilizwi likaThixo; nisingasinga impumelelo yehambo yabo, nixelise bona elukholweni lwabo.

8.verse: UYesu Kristu ukwanguye izolo, nanamhla, ase nakuwo amaphakade.

9.verse: Musani ukuphetshethwa ziimfundiso ngeemfundiso nezingezizo;  kuba kuhle ukuba intliziyo iqine lubabalo; kungabi ngeento ezidliwayo, abangancedekanga zizo abo bahamba kuzo.

10.verse: Sinesibingelelo thina, abangenagunya lakudla kuso abo bakhonza umnquba.

11.verse: Kuba ezo zinto ziphilileyo, zigazi lazo lingeniswa ngenxa yesono kweyona ngcwele nguye umbingeleli omkhulu, imizimba yazo itshiselwa ngaphandle kweminquba.

12.verse: Kungoko athe noYesu, ukuze abangcwalise abantu ngelilelakhe igazi, weva ubunzima ngaphandle kwesango.

13.verse: Masiphume ke ngoko siye kuye ngaphandle kweminquba,  sithwele ingcikivo yakhe.

14.verse: Kuba apha asinamzi uhleliyo, singxamele lowo uza kuza.

15.verse: Ngoko masithi ngaye sinyuse ngamaxesha onke kuye uThixo umbingelelo wendumiso, oko kukuthi, isiqhamo somlomo olivumayo igama lakhe.

16.verse: Ke ukwenza okuhle nobudlelane, musani ukukulibala; kuba imibingelelo enjalo uyakholiswa kakuhle yiyo uThixo.

17.verse: Bathambeleni abakhokeli benu, nibathobele; kuba bona abalali, ngenxa yemiphefumlo yenu, ngokwabaya kuphendula, ukuze bakwenze oko bevuyile, bengancwini; kuba anisizakali kuko oko.

18.verse: Sithandazeleni; kuba sikholosekile kukuthi sinesazela esilungileyo, singa ezintweni zonke singahamba kakuhle.

19.verse: Ndiyavuselela ke ngokugqithiseleyo, ukuba nikwenze oko,  ukuze ndibuyiselwe kuni kamsinyane.

20.verse: Ke kaloku uThixo woxolo, lowo wamvusayo kwabafileyo uMalusi oMkhulu wezimvu, ngegazi lomnqophiso ongunaphakade,

21.verse: iNkosi yethu uYesu, wanga anganilungisa, nigqibelele emisebenzini yonke elungileyo, ukuze nikwenze ukuthanda kwakhe,  esenza ngaphakathi kwenu oko kukholekileyo emehlweni akhe,  ngoYesu Kristu. Kuye makubekho uzuko, luse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.

22.verse: Ndiyanivuselela ke nina, bazalwana, linyamezeleni ilizwi lovuselelo olu; kuba ke ndinibhalele ngokufutshane.

23.verse: Yazini ukuba umzalwana wethu uTimoti ukhululwe; endothi,  xa angaba uthe wafika kamsinya, ndinibone ndinaye.

24.verse: Babuliseni bonke abakhokeli benu, nabo bonke abangcwele.  Bayanibulisa abavela eItaliya.
